description: This dataset details bank-owned homes that are on the market. This is an aggregate of public listings from banks.

metadata.attribution: South Suburban Mayors and Managers Association
metadata.description: This dataset is available bank-owned residential across the Chicago Southland. This is an aggregation of publicly available available reo lists from banks such as Wells Fargo, Bank of America, and Chase.

name: SSMMA Available Bank- Owned Residential
